def transform_input_data(input_data):
    output_list = [['', 'Art&Des', 'CreatArt', 'D&T', 'English', 'Geography', 'History', "Hu'ties", 'ICT', 'Maths', 'MFL', 'PE', 'Science']]
    current_name = None
    current_grades = []

    for entry in input_data:
        name, subject, grade = entry
        if name:
            if current_name:
                output_list.append(current_grades)
            current_name = name
            current_grades = [name]
        current_grades.append(grade)

    if current_grades:
        output_list.append(current_grades)
    
    return output_list

def transform_input_data(input_data):
    output_list = [['', 'Art&Des', 'CreatArt', 'D&T', 'English', 'Geography', 'History', "Hu'ties", 'ICT', 'Maths', 'MFL', 'PE', 'Science']]
    current_name = None
    current_grades = []

    for entry in input_data:
        name, subject, grade = entry
        if name:
            if current_name:
                output_list.append(current_grades)
            current_name = name
            current_grades = [name]
        current_grades.append(grade)

    if current_grades:
        output_list.append(current_grades)
    
    return output_list

def transform_input_data(input_data):
    output_list = [['', 'Art&Des', 'CreatArt', 'D&T', 'English', 'Geography', 'History', "Hu'ties", 'ICT', 'Maths', 'MFL', 'PE', 'Science']]
    current_name = None
    current_grades = []

    for entry in input_data:
        name, subject, grade = entry
        if name:
            if current_name:
                output_list.append(current_grades)
            current_name = name
            current_grades = [name]
        current_grades.append(grade)

    if current_grades:
        output_list.append(current_grades)
    
    return output_list
